item.description:
These social gatherings are an open invitation for anyone interested in attending and/or discussing all things freedom.

RSVPs here are welcome, but there are generally at least a dozen people there even when no one responds on Meetup, so take a chance and drop on by!

Monthly Business Meetings are held on the 2nd Monday of each month, check the calendar for location and further details.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the Seacoast Liberty meetup or for Tom?
item.name: NH Seacoast Liberty Meetup
